info.name: server_url
info.description: The URL of the desired SugarCRM server (For example, https://sugarcrm.domain.com/sugarcrm).

info.name: username
info.description: The login name of the SugarCRM user to authenticate as.

info.name: password
info.description: The password of the SugarCRM user to authenticate as.

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enable debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
